ad_group_id.description: The ID of the ad group to which the ad belongs.

android_deep_link.description: The deep link URL for Android devices.

items.description: The deep link URLs for individual carousel items on Android devices.
The destination URLs for individual carousel items.
The deep link URLs for individual carousel items on iOS devices.

click_tracking_url.description: The URL for tracking clicks on the ad.

creative_type.description: The type of creative used in the ad.

destination_url.description: The main destination URL of the ad.

ios_deep_link.description: The deep link URL for iOS devices.

is_pin_deleted.description: A flag indicating if the ad is linked to a deleted pin.

is_removable.description: A flag indicating if the ad is removable.

name.description: The name or title of the ad.

pin_id.description: The ID of the pin associated with the ad.

status.description: The current status of the ad.

items.description: Tracking URLs for clicks on the ad.

view_tracking_url.description: The URL for tracking views of the ad.

lead_form_id.description: The ID of the lead form associated with the ad.

ad_account_id.description: The ID of the ad account associated with the ad data.

campaign_id.description: The ID of the campaign associated with the ad.

collection_items_destination_url_templat.description: The template URL for destination pages of collection items.

created_time.description: The timestamp when the ad was created.

id.description: The unique ID of the ad.

items.description: Reasons for rejection of the ad.

review_status.description: The review status of the ad.

updated_time.description: The timestamp when the ad was last updated.

summary_status.description: The summarized status of the ad.
